cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.4)

project(test)
set(
source_list

  ../../src/gamepad.h
  ../../src/gamepad_window.c
  ../../src/gamepad_window.h
  ../../src/gb_ini.h
  ../../src/libs.c

target_link_libraries(test_touchjoy gdi32)
